body: Sorry my comment comes after you worked in the PR, but as I mentioned in the issue https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/15610#issuecomment-413802674 I wouldn't merge this, as I think the right approach should be having this functionality with something like `pandas.set_option('display.eng_float_format')`
Okay.. Can I close this PR?
